msg: * STATUS: Add r13358 as 1.1.4 candidate.

author: breser
msg: Create temporary branch for r13358 backport to 1.1.x since the test changes
create conflicts.

author: fitz
msg: Part 2 of a two-step commit for making lock/unlock operations continue
after encountering non-fatal locking errors.  This commit passes
locking-related errors from the ra layer back to the callback(s),
which can notify the user as well as manage the lock state in the
working copy much better (a failed unlock attempt will remove any
defunct tokens from the working copy).
* subversion/libsvn_ra_local/ra_plugin.c(svn_ra_local__unlock,
svn_ra_local__unlock),
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/client.c(svn_ra_local__lock,
svn_ra_local__unlock),
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/session.c(svn_ra_dav__lock,
svn_ra_dav__unlock):Pass locking/unlocking errors to the
lock_func callback.
* subversion/libsvn_client/locking_commands.c(store_locks_callback):
If we got an error, don't attempt to store a lock (which would be
NULL anyway).  Remove a lock token in all cases except where we got
a lock owner mismatch error.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/lock-cmd.c(print_lock_info): Print out
ra_err message if we receive an error from our caller.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/unlock-cmd.c(print_unlock_info): Print
out ra_err message if we receive an error from our caller.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/error.c (svn_error_is_lock_error,
svn_error_is_unlock_error): New functions.
* subversion/include/svn_error.h (svn_error_is_lock_error,
svn_error_is_unlock_error): New function declarations.

author: breser
msg: Fix Issue #2222
* subversion/libsvn_client/diff.c
(merge_dir_added): Don't use the svn_opt_revision_t in the merge_cmd_baton
to determine the copyfrom_rev because a symbolic revision (e.g. HEAD) or
no revision may have been specified on the command line.  Instead we
should use the revision the driver of the editor passes us.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/merge_tests.py
(merge_dir_branches): New test that tests for this bug.
(test_list): Add merge_dir_branches to the tests to run.

author: ehu
msg: Do more checks on preconditions for utf8_tests.py being met.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/utf8_tests.py (): On Windows, we want
to run these tests. On all other platforms, we want to run the tests
if the environment holds the correct locale settings *and* we were able
to switch our own locale to iso-8859-1.
